description:
A cozy parka that makes frigid weekday commutes a little more bearable, and weekend snowshoeing outings a lot more enjoyable. Made using recycled materials, the Belleview stretch parka is feel good warmth. Channels of recycled down wrap your core, while quilted Heatseeker Eco synthetic insulation keeps your arms toasty. And the stretchy recycled material won’t get in the way of your favourite dance moves.

  • Stretchy polyester blend moves with you and dries quickly
  • Ribbed side panels provide an improved range of motion
  • PFC-free DWR finish lets the parka shake off light rain and snow
  • Light and warm recycled down insulation throughout your core
  • Insulated hood keeps your thoughts warm when you forget your toque
  • 2-way Vislon® front zipper gives you venting options and means you don’t need to unzip your coat to sit down comfortably
  • Zippered hand pockets keep your hands warm and your phone close
  • Synthetic Heatseeker™ ECO insulation (70% recycled) in the arms keeps you warm, even when wet
  • Slim fit stays comfortably close to your body
name: The North Face Belleview Stretch Down Parka - Women's
